content: I'm trying to help with https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/76495, but I don't see any errors from clippy's compiletest fork until it finishes running all 800 tests :( is there a way to tell it to fail fast?
also it just printed about 30000 lines of errors so that's fun
ok clippy is going to be a project for another day, there's like 12 things making this hard to debug
